articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The crypto industry bore witness to one of the most sudden and devastating contractions of wealth in financial history.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: FTX Goes Broke, Bitcoin Falls to Two-Year Low

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Several wallets belonging to FTX were rapidly drained before midnight. An FTX Telegram admin called it a hack and warned users not to visit the site.
articles.title: Hundreds of Millions of Dollars Drained From FTX Overnight in 'Unauthorized' Transfers

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: When SBF approached Musk about investing in his Twitter bid, Musk asked his banker Michael Grimes, "Does Sam actually have $3B liquid?"
articles.title: Elon Musk: Sam Bankman-Fried 'Set Off My BS Detector' When He Approached About Twitter Investment

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo,Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: FTX's ignominious collapse was inevitable, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin said at LaBitConf Friday.
articles.title: 'Like a 1930s Dictator': Vitalik Buterin Lays Into Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Amid questions over holdings, Crypto.com shares its data—and a major meme token makes up a big chunk of its reserves.
articles.title: Crypto.com Holds 20% of Its Reserves in Meme Token SHIB

articles.author: Daniel Roberts,Andrew Hayward
articles.description: FTX signed sports deals worth $375 million—and that's just the deals with publicly reported price tags. Now it has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy.
articles.title: FTX Spent Hundreds of Millions of Dollars on Sports Marketing on Road to Bankruptcy

articles.author: Andrew Hayward,Kate Irwin
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s net worth evaporated this week alongside his businesses—and apparently billions’ worth of customer assets.
articles.title: From $26 Billion to Nothing: The Rise and Fall of SBF and FTX

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: If a Canadian pension fund investing in a crypto firm that’s gone bankrupt sounds familiar, that’s because it happened with Celsius Network.
articles.title: Ontario Teachers Sunk $95M in FTX—Pension Fund Says Collapse Will Have 'Limited Impact'

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: A former partner at Lightspeed Ventures, Wu joined the investment arm of FTX in January, funding several crypto startups.
articles.title: Amy Wu Resigns From FTX Ventures as SBF's Crypto Empire Unravels

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: One of FTX’s many sports world partners has pulled back as the exchange files for bankruptcy protection.
articles.title: Mercedes F1 Team Suspends FTX Deal Amid Company's Collapse

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: A mysterious wash-trading arbitrageur has, it appears, found a cunning way to retrieve his or her frozen millions from the rubble of FTX.
articles.title: How to Get Money Out of FTX (But Only If You’re Filthy Rich)

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Bankman-Fried said he is still "piecing together all of the details" of how he lost billions of dollars of users’ funds.
articles.title: Disgraced FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried Says He’s Really Sorry—Again

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: After a dramatic week, crypto exchange FTX has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy and its CEO Sam Bankman-Fried has resigned.
articles.title: FTX Files Chapter 11 Bankruptcy, SBF Steps Down as CEO

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: Along with urging the FTX chief to “tell the truth,” Scaramucci said his firm is working to buy back the exchange’s 30% stake in Skybridge.
articles.title: SkyBridge's Scaramucci to SBF: 'Tell the Truth'

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The Coinbase CEO said that if the U.S. can catch up on regulating crypto, customers won’t be driven towards offshore exchanges.
articles.title: FTX Crisis an 'Opportunity' for US to Clarify Crypto Regulations: Coinbase CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The ambitious philanthropic project is set to wind down its operations following the near collapse of its parent and beneficiary FTX.
articles.title: FTX Foundation Shutters Effective Altruism Fund as Key Execs Resign

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: California's finance regulator issued a consumer alert, announcing an investigation into FTX and urging affected clients to contact the DFPI.
articles.title: California Announces Investigation Into ‘Apparent Failure” of Crypto Exchange FTX

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Investors had a brief reprieve from the deepening FTX crisis thanks to limited withdrawals and rosier inflation numbers.
articles.title: Ethereum, Dogecoin, and Polygon Post Fresh Gains as Crypto Rebounds

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Exchange tokens are the backbone of many top exchanges, but how much risk is involved?
articles.title: What You Need to Know About Exchange Tokens After FTX's FTT Meltdown

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Also, California state regulators open an investigation and warn consumers of “volatile crypto assets.”
articles.title: BlockFi Pausing Withdrawals in Wake of FTX, Alameda Collapse

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Securities Commission of the Bahamas, to which FTX relocated last year, issued the order.
articles.title: Bahamas Freezes FTX Assets, Calls for Liquidator

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Binance had originally received FTT tokens as part of its divestment from Sam Bankman-Fried’s exchange last year. But it’s only been able to sell off a small amount.
articles.title: After Rattling Confidence in FTX, Binance Still Holds 5% of FTT Supply

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The crypto exchange continues to reduce its headcount in the protracted bear market.
articles.title: Coinbase Lays Off Over 60 Employees Amid Crypto Market Turmoil

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Sinking ETH value and potential panic-selling pushes the NFT “blue chip” down—now 82% off its peak price from April.
articles.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Prices Fall After FTX Sinks Crypto Market

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The exhortations from the executive branch prompted harsh words from Edward Snowden.
articles.title: White House Ramps Up Crypto Regulation Rhetoric Following FTX Crash

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Rumors spread earlier that El Salvador was holding its Bitcoin on the collapsing exchange.
articles.title: El Salvador President Denies Storing Bitcoin on FTX: Binance CEO

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Some users were able to withdraw large amounts, including half a million worth of USDC sent to a wallet on Binance and $1.3 million USDC.
articles.title: FTX Users Pull Millions Off the Exchange as Limited Withdrawals Resume

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Amid FTX’s wider liquidity crunch, the US business—which CEO SBF says is totally separate—said that trading may stop soon.
articles.title: FTX US Warns Users That Trading Could Be Halted 'In a Few Days'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Things looked dire for Solana on Wednesday, but SOL is climbing again after a softened staking unlock had only modest impact.
articles.title: Solana Weathers the FTX Storm: SOL Rises 33% Amid 'Crucible Moment'

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: FTX US Derivatives will “soon be entirely separate” from FTX, CEO Zach Dexter wrote in the letter.
articles.title: FTX US Derivatives CEO: Funds Are Safe, Business 'Almost Entirely Separate'

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: FTX’s sinking ship needs capital. It's looking to Kraken for aid, according to reports, but cofounder Jesse Powell doesn't sound very interested.
articles.title: FTX May Be Looking to Kraken for Help—But Jesse Powell Says There Are 'Red Flags'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: After a wild week, a badly beaten market at last gets some relief.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Get a Boost as CPI Shows Inflation Cooling

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) is now trading at its all-time low discount of more than 40% to the spot price of Bitcoin.
articles.title: Grayscale's Bitcoin Fund GBTC Hits Record-Low 40% Discount

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: If all crypto tokens are classified as securities, the SEC can go after the largest exchanges and marketplaces.
articles.title: The SEC Beat LBRY. Will It Go After Exchanges Like Coinbase Next?

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: In a lengthy Twitter thread against the FTX exchange, Jesse Powell said the crisis was "a massive setback" for the industry.
articles.title: FTX Crisis Is a 'Gift to Bitcoin Haters': Kraken Founder Jesse Powell

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: CoinShares revealed it has a hefty amount of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other assets trapped on the exchange but has no exposure to Alameda Research.
articles.title: CoinShares Confirms $30.3 Million Exposure to FTX

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: "When markets turned on them, it appears that a lot of customers lost money," said SEC Chair Gary Gensler on Thursday morning.
articles.title: Crypto Platforms Use 'Toxic Combination' of Trading User Funds Without Disclosure: SEC Chair Gary Gensler

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: FTX chief Sam Bankman-Fried allegedly used customer funds to support the exchange’s sister firm Alameda Research.
articles.title: FTX Used Client Funds, FTT Tokens, and Robinhood Shares to Prop Up Alameda: Report

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: "They aren't doing any of the weird things that I see on Twitter—and nothing large at all," SBF said.
articles.title: SBF Says He Will Wind Down Alameda and Spend the Week Trying to Raise Money for FTX

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The Tron founder’s statements prompted a spike in the value of Sun-related cryptocurrencies currently trapped on crypto exchange FTX.
articles.title: Tron's Justin Sun Announces Plans to Return ‘Normalcy for All FTX Users’

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi

articles.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson  at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a  metaverse."
articles.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
